Events.Description:
Frankenstein (4:18 min)
What starts out as a daring scientific experiment, quickly escalates into a horrific nightmare. Frankenstein XD will take you on a frighteningly fun adventure as you try and escape from the clutches of “The Monster!” RUN!!!

Panic House (3:40 min)
A tranquil, lush, countryside Victorian home at the end of the road mutates into a house of horrors as your host morphs into a demonic thing that will stop at nothing to destroy you. RUN!! Escape, or be imprisoned forever!

Friday the 13th (9:02 min)
JASON VOORHEES™, the world's most recognizable horror icon, slashes his way through thirteen of the series' best kills. Experience a whole new level of fear as you come face-to-face with this machete-wielding killer.
Events.Title: Level 3: Dare to be Scared!

Events.Description:
Happy Family - The Ride (5:49 min)
Experience the fast-paced, magical mayhem of Happy Family The Ride as the Wishbone family attempts to reverse the spell that an evil witch places on them. Guests will be spellbound as they follow the family on their ludicrously spooky adventure!

Extreme Log Ride (5:13 min)
In 2020 humankind is on the brink of a major environmental disaster. To save us from extinction, scientists develop a super tree. Follow the life of a super-tree in a spectacular ride that bounces, tumbles and flies through the farm known as Himalamazon.

Dracula - The Ride (3:43 min)
On holiday in Transylvania, teenager Kevin and his bumbling Dad accidentally awaken the undead vampire Dracula!
Events.Title: Level 1: Fun for All!

Events.Description:
Frankenstein (4:18 min)
What starts out as a daring scientific experiment, quickly escalates into a horrific nightmare. Frankenstein XD will take you on a frighteningly fun adventure as you try and escape from the clutches of “The Monster!” RUN!!!

Panic House (3:40 min)
A tranquil, lush, countryside Victorian home at the end of the road mutates into a house of horrors as your host morphs into a demonic thing that will stop at nothing to destroy you. RUN!! Escape, or be imprisoned forever!

Friday the 13th (9:02 min)
JASON VOORHEES™, the world's most recognizable horror icon, slashes his way through thirteen of the series' best kills. Experience a whole new level of fear as you come face-to-face with this machete-wielding killer.
Events.Title: Level 3: Dare to be Scared!

Events.Description:
Happy Family - The Ride (5:49 min)
Experience the fast-paced, magical mayhem of Happy Family The Ride as the Wishbone family attempts to reverse the spell that an evil witch places on them. Guests will be spellbound as they follow the family on their ludicrously spooky adventure!

Extreme Log Ride (5:13 min)
In 2020 humankind is on the brink of a major environmental disaster. To save us from extinction, scientists develop a super tree. Follow the life of a super-tree in a spectacular ride that bounces, tumbles and flies through the farm known as Himalamazon.

Dracula - The Ride (3:43 min)
On holiday in Transylvania, teenager Kevin and his bumbling Dad accidentally awaken the undead vampire Dracula!

Events.Description:
Happy Family - The Ride (5:49 min)
Experience the fast-paced, magical mayhem of Happy Family The Ride as the Wishbone family attempts to reverse the spell that an evil witch places on them. Guests will be spellbound as they follow the family on their ludicrously spooky adventure!

Extreme Log Ride (5:13 min)
In 2020 humankind is on the brink of a major environmental disaster. To save us from extinction, scientists develop a super tree. Follow the life of a super-tree in a spectacular ride that bounces, tumbles and flies through the farm known as Himalamazon.

Dracula - The Ride (3:43 min)
On holiday in Transylvania, teenager Kevin and his bumbling Dad accidentally awaken the undead vampire Dracula!
Events.Title: Level 1: Fun for All!
